remarks: Evaluate a collapsing sum over the Möbius function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
statement:
musumsum.1 $e |- ( m = 1 -> B = C ) $.
musumsum.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
musumsum.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ NN ) $.
musumsum.4 $e |- ( ph -> 1 e. A ) $.
musumsum.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ m e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
musumsum $p |- ( ph -> sum_ m e. A sum_ k e. { n e. NN | n || m } ( ( mmu ` k ) x. B ) = C ) $.
$d A k m $.
$d B k $.
$d C m $.
$d k m n $.
$d k m ph $.
